00055 void InitSquads( void )
00056 {
00057       // init the squad lists to NULL ptrs.
00058       INT32 iCounterB = 0;
00059       INT32 iCounter =0;
00060       GROUP       *pGroup     =     NULL;
00061 
00062       // null each list of ptrs.
00063       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter <  NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
00064       {
00065             for( iCounterB =0; iCounterB < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounterB++ )
00066             {
00067             
00068               // squad, soldier 
00069               Squad[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ]= NULL;
00070 
00071             }
00072 
00073             // create mvt groups
00074             SquadMovementGroups[ iCounter ] = CreateNewPlayerGroupDepartingFromSector( 1, 1 );
00075 
00076             // Set persistent....
00077             pGroup = GetGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ iCounter ] );
00078             pGroup->fPersistant = TRUE;
00079 
00080       }
00081 
00082       memset( sDeadMercs, -1, sizeof( INT16 ) * NUMBER_OF_SQUADS * NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD );
00083 
00084       return;
00085 }
00086 
00087 BOOLEAN IsThisSquadFull( INT8 bSquadValue )
00088 {
00089       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00090 
00091       // run through entries in the squad list, make sure there is a free entry
00092       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
00093       {
00094             // check this slot
00095             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] == NULL )
00096             {
00097                   // a free slot found - not full
00098                   return( FALSE );
00099             }
00100       }
00101 
00102       // no free slots - it's full
00103       return( TRUE );
00104 }
00105 
00106 INT8 GetFirstEmptySquad( void )
00107 {
00108       UINT8 ubCounter = 0;
00109 
00110       for( ubCounter = 0; ubCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; ubCounter++ )
00111       {
00112             if( SquadIsEmpty( ubCounter ) == TRUE )
00113             {
00114                   // empty squad, return value
00115                   return( ubCounter );
00116             }
00117       }
00118 
00119       // not found - none are completely empty (shouldn't ever happen!)
00120       Assert( FALSE );
00121       return( -1 );
00122 }

00124 BOOLEAN AddCharacterToSquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter, INT8 bSquadValue )
00125 {
00126       INT8 bCounter =0;
00127       INT16 sX, sY;
00128       INT8  bZ;
00129 //    BOOLEAN fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
00130       GROUP *pGroup;
00131       BOOLEAN fNewSquad;
00132 
00133 
00134       // add character to squad...return success or failure
00135       // run through list of people in squad, find first free slo
00136 
00137       if( fExitingVehicleToSquad )
00138       {
00139             return( FALSE );
00140       }
00141 
00142 
00143       // ATE: If any vehicle exists in this squad AND we're not set to 
00144       // a driver or or passenger, when return false
00145       if ( DoesVehicleExistInSquad( bSquadValue ) )
00146       {
00147             // We're not allowing anybody to go on a vehicle if they are not passengers!
00148             // NB: We obviously need to make sure that REAL passengers have their
00149             // flags set before adding them to a squad!
00150             if ( !( pCharacter->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) )
00151             {
00152                   return( FALSE );
00153             }
00154       }
00155 
00156 
00157 
00158       // if squad is on the move, can't add someone
00159       if( IsThisSquadOnTheMove( bSquadValue ) == TRUE )
00160       {
00161             // nope, go away now
00162             return( FALSE );
00163       }
00164       
00165 
00166 
00167       for( bCounter =0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; bCounter++ )
00168       {
00169             // check if on current squad and current slot?
00170             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] == pCharacter )
00171             {
00172                   // 'successful of sorts, if there, then he's 'added'
00173                   return ( TRUE );
00174             }
00175 
00176             // free slot, add here
00177             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] == NULL )
00178             {
00179                   // check if squad empty, if not check sector x,y,z are the same as this guys
00180                   if( SquadIsEmpty( bSquadValue ) == FALSE )
00181                   {
00182                         GetLocationOfSquad( &sX, &sY, &bZ, bSquadValue );
00183 
00184                         // if not same, return false
00185                         if( ( pCharacter->sSectorX != sX ) || ( pCharacter -> sSectorY != sY ) ||( pCharacter->bSectorZ != bZ) )
00186                         {
00187                               return ( FALSE );
00188                         }
00189                         // remove them
00190                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pCharacter );
00191 
00192 //                      fBetweenSectors =  Squad[ bSquadValue ][ 0 ]->fBetweenSectors;
00193                   }
00194                   else
00195                   {
00196                         // remove them
00197                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pCharacter );
00198                   }
00199 
00200 /*
00201                   if( fBetweenSectors == TRUE )
00202                   {
00203                         pCharacter->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
00204                   }
00205 */
00206 
00207                   // copy path of squad to this char
00208                   CopyPathOfSquadToCharacter( pCharacter, bSquadValue );
00209 
00210                   // check if old mvt group
00211                   if( pCharacter -> ubGroupID != 0 )
00212                   {
00213                         // in valid group, remove from that group
00214                         RemovePlayerFromGroup(  pCharacter -> ubGroupID , pCharacter );
00215 
00216                         // character not on a reserved group
00217                         if( ( pCharacter->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) && ( pCharacter->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) )
00218                         {
00219                               // get the group from the character
00220                               pGroup = GetGroup( pCharacter -> ubGroupID );
00221                               
00222                               // if valid group, delete it
00223                               if( pGroup )
00224                               {
00225                                     RemoveGroupFromList( pGroup );
00226                               }
00227                         }
00228                         
00229                   }
00230 
00231                   
00232                   
00233 
00234                   if( ( pCharacter->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pCharacter->iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId ) && ( pCharacter-> iVehicleId != -1 ) )
00235                   {
00236                         // if creating a new squad from guys exiting the chopper                
00237                         fNewSquad = SquadIsEmpty( bSquadValue );
00238 
00239                         RemoveSoldierFromHelicopter( pCharacter );
00240 
00241                         AddPlayerToGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ], pCharacter  );
00242                         SetGroupSectorValue( pCharacter->sSectorX, pCharacter->sSectorY, pCharacter->bSectorZ, SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ] );
00243                         pCharacter -> ubGroupID = SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ];
00244 
00245                         // if we've just started a new squad
00246                         if ( fNewSquad )
00247                         {
00248                               // set mvt group for 
00249                               GROUP *pGroup;
00250 
00251                               // grab group
00252                               pGroup = GetGroup( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup );
00253                               Assert( pGroup );
00254 
00255                               if( pGroup )
00256                               {
00257                                     // set where it is and where it's going, then make it arrive there.  Don't check for battle
00258                                     PlaceGroupInSector( SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ], pGroup->ubPrevX, pGroup->ubPrevY, pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ, FALSE );
00259                               }
00260                         }
00261                   }
00262                   else if( ( pCharacter->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pCharacter-> iVehicleId != -1 ) )
00263                   {
00264                         fExitingVehicleToSquad = TRUE;
00265                         // remove from vehicle
00266                         TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pCharacter );
00267                         fExitingVehicleToSquad = FALSE;
00268                         
00269 
00270                         AddPlayerToGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ], pCharacter  );
00271                         SetGroupSectorValue( pCharacter->sSectorX, pCharacter->sSectorY, pCharacter->bSectorZ, SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ] );
00272                         pCharacter -> ubGroupID = SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ];
00273                   }
00274                   else 
00275                   {
00276                         AddPlayerToGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ], pCharacter  );
00277                         SetGroupSectorValue( pCharacter->sSectorX, pCharacter->sSectorY, pCharacter->bSectorZ, SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ] );
00278                         pCharacter -> ubGroupID = SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ];
00279                   }
00280 
00281 
00282                   // assign here
00283                   Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] = pCharacter;
00284                   
00285                   if( ( pCharacter->bAssignment != bSquadValue ) )
00286                   {
00287                         // check to see if we should wake them up
00288                         if ( pCharacter->fMercAsleep )
00289                         {
00290                               // try to wake him up
00291                               SetMercAwake( pCharacter, FALSE, FALSE );
00292                         }
00293                         SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pCharacter );
00294                   }
00295 
00296                   // set squad value
00297                   ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pCharacter, bSquadValue );
00298                   if ( pCharacter->bOldAssignment < ON_DUTY )
00299                   {
00300                         pCharacter->bOldAssignment = bSquadValue;
00301                   }
00302                               
00303                   // if current tactical sqaud...upadte panel
00304                   if( NumberOfPeopleInSquad( ( INT8 )iCurrentTacticalSquad ) == 0 )
00305                   {
00306                         SetCurrentSquad( bSquadValue, TRUE );
00307                   }
00308 
00309                   if( bSquadValue == ( INT8 ) iCurrentTacticalSquad )
00310                   {
00311                         CheckForAndAddMercToTeamPanel( Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ bCounter ] );
00312                   }
00313 
00314                   if ( pCharacter->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
00315                   {
00316                         SetCurrentSquad( bSquadValue, TRUE );
00317                   }
00318                   
00319 
00320                   return ( TRUE );
00321             }
00322       }
00323 
00324       return ( FALSE );
00325 }

00327 
00328 // find the first slot we can fit the guy in
00329 BOOLEAN AddCharacterToAnySquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter )
00330 {
00331       // add character to any squad, if character is assigned to a squad, returns TRUE
00332       INT8 bCounter = 0;
00333       INT8 bFirstEmptySquad = -1;
00334 
00335       
00336       // remove them from current squad
00337       RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pCharacter );
00338 
00339       // first look for a compatible NON-EMPTY squad (don't start new squad if we don't have to)
00340       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; bCounter++ )
00341       {
00342             if( SquadIsEmpty( bCounter ) == FALSE )
00343             {
00344                   if( AddCharacterToSquad( pCharacter, bCounter ) == TRUE )
00345                   {
00346                         return ( TRUE );
00347                   }
00348             }
00349             else
00350             {
00351                   if ( bFirstEmptySquad == -1 )
00352                   {
00353                         bFirstEmptySquad = bCounter;
00354                   }
00355             }
00356       }
00357 
00358       // no non-empty compatible squads were found
00359 
00360       // try the first empty one (and there better be one)
00361       if ( bFirstEmptySquad != -1 )
00362       {
00363             if( AddCharacterToSquad( pCharacter, bFirstEmptySquad ) == TRUE )
00364             {
00365                   return ( TRUE );
00366             }
00367       }
00368 
00369       // should never happen!
00370       Assert( FALSE );
00371       return( FALSE );
00372 }
00373 
00374 // find the first slot we can fit the guy in
00375 INT8 AddCharacterToUniqueSquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter )
00376 {
00377       // add character to any squad, if character is assigned to a squad, returns TRUE
00378       INT8 bCounter = 0;
00379       
00380       // check if character on a squad
00381 
00382             // remove them
00383       RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pCharacter );
00384 
00385       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; bCounter++ )
00386       {
00387             if( SquadIsEmpty( bCounter ) == TRUE )
00388             {
00389                   if( AddCharacterToSquad( pCharacter, bCounter ) == TRUE )
00390                   {
00391                         return ( bCounter );
00392                   }
00393             }
00394       }
00395 
00396       return( -1 );
00397 }

00400 BOOLEAN SquadIsEmpty( INT8 bSquadValue )
00401 {
00402       // run through this squad's slots and find if they ALL are empty
00403       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00404       
00405       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; iCounter++ )
00406       {
00407             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] != NULL )
00408             {
00409                   return ( FALSE );
00410             }
00411       }
00412 
00413       return( TRUE );
00414 }

00418 // find and remove characters from any squad
00419 BOOLEAN RemoveCharacterFromSquads( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter )
00420 {
00421       INT32 iCounterA = 0;
00422       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00423       UINT8 ubGroupId = 0;
00424       // find character and remove.. check characters in all squads
00425 
00426 
00427       // squad?
00428       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ; iCounterA++ )
00429       {
00430             // slot?
00431             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; iCounter++ )
00432             {
00433 
00434                   // check if on current squad and current slot?
00435                   if( Squad[ iCounterA ][ iCounter ] == pCharacter )
00436                   {
00437                   
00438                         
00439                         // found and nulled
00440                         Squad[ iCounterA ][ iCounter ] = NULL;
00441 
00442                         // Release memory for his personal path, BUT DON'T CLEAR HIS GROUP'S PATH/WAYPOINTS (pass in groupID -1).
00443                         // Just because one guy leaves a group is no reason to cancel movement for the rest of the group.
00444                         pCharacter -> pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pCharacter -> pMercPath, -1 );
00445 
00446                         // remove character from mvt group
00447                         RemovePlayerFromGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ iCounterA ], pCharacter  );
00448                         
00449                         // reset player mvt group id value
00450                         pCharacter -> ubGroupID = 0;
00451 
00452                         if( ( pCharacter->fBetweenSectors )&&( pCharacter-> uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
00453                         {
00454                               ubGroupId = CreateNewPlayerGroupDepartingFromSector( ( INT8 ) ( pCharacter -> sSectorX ) , ( INT8 ) ( pCharacter -> sSectorY ) );
00455                         
00456                               // assign to a group
00457                               AddPlayerToGroup( ubGroupId, pCharacter );                  
00458                         }
00459                   
00460                         RebuildSquad( ( INT8 )iCounterA );
00461 
00462                         if( pCharacter->bLife == 0 )
00463                         {
00464                               AddDeadCharacterToSquadDeadGuys( pCharacter, iCounterA );
00465                         }
00466 
00467                               //if we are not loading a saved game
00468                         if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) && guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00469                         {
00470                               UpdateCurrentlySelectedMerc( pCharacter, ( INT8 )iCounterA );
00471                         }
00472 
00473                         return ( TRUE );
00474                   }
00475             }
00476       }
00477 
00478       // not found
00479       return ( FALSE );
00480 }

00482 BOOLEAN RemoveCharacterFromASquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter, INT8 bSquadValue )
00483 {
00484 
00485       INT32 iCounter =0, iCounterA = 0;
00486 
00487       // remove character from particular squad..return if successful
00488       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; iCounter++ )
00489       {
00490             // check if on current squad and current slot?
00491             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] == pCharacter )
00492             {
00493 
00494                   UpdateCurrentlySelectedMerc( pCharacter, bSquadValue );
00495 
00496                   // found and nulled
00497                   Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] = NULL;
00498 
00499                   // remove character from mvt group
00500                   RemovePlayerFromGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ bSquadValue ], pCharacter );
00501 
00502 
00503                   if( pCharacter->bLife == 0 )
00504                   {
00505                         AddDeadCharacterToSquadDeadGuys( pCharacter, iCounterA );
00506                   }
00507 
00508                   RebuildSquad( bSquadValue );
00509 
00510 
00511                   // found
00512                   return ( TRUE );
00513             }
00514       }
00515 
00516       // not found
00517       return ( FALSE );
00518 }

00559 INT8 SquadCharacterIsIn( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter )
00560 {
00561       // returns which squad character is in, -1 if none found
00562       INT8 iCounterA =0, iCounter = 0;
00563 
00564       // squad?
00565       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ; iCounterA++ )
00566       {
00567             // slot?
00568             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; iCounter++ )
00569             {
00570 
00571                   // check if on current squad and current slot?
00572                   if( Squad[ iCounterA ][ iCounter ] == pCharacter )
00573                   {
00574                         // return value
00575                         return ( iCounterA );
00576                   }
00577             }
00578       }
00579 
00580       // return failure
00581       return ( -1 );
00582 }

00584 INT8 NumberOfPeopleInSquad( INT8 bSquadValue )
00585 {
00586       INT8 bCounter = 0;
00587       INT8 bSquadCount = 0;
00588 
00589       if( bSquadValue == NO_CURRENT_SQUAD )
00590       {
00591             return( 0 );
00592       }
00593 
00594       // find number of characters in particular squad.
00595       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; bCounter++ )
00596       {
00597 
00598             // valid slot?
00599             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != NULL )
00600             {
00601                   // yep
00602                   bSquadCount++;
00603             }
00604       }
00605 
00606       // return number found
00607       return( bSquadCount );
00608 }
00609 
00610 INT8 NumberOfNonEPCsInSquad( INT8 bSquadValue )
00611 {
00612       INT8 bCounter = 0;
00613       INT8 bSquadCount = 0;
00614 
00615       if( bSquadValue == NO_CURRENT_SQUAD )
00616       {
00617             return( 0 );
00618       }
00619 
00620       // find number of characters in particular squad.
00621       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; bCounter++ )
00622       {
00623 
00624             // valid slot?
00625             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != NULL && !AM_AN_EPC( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] ) )
00626             {
00627                   // yep
00628                   bSquadCount++;
00629             }
00630       }
00631 
00632       // return number found
00633       return( bSquadCount );
00634 }
00635 
00636 BOOLEAN IsRobotControllerInSquad( INT8 bSquadValue )
00637 {
00638       INT8 bCounter = 0;
00639 
00640       if( bSquadValue == NO_CURRENT_SQUAD )
00641       {
00642             return( 0 );
00643       }
00644 
00645       // find number of characters in particular squad.
00646       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; bCounter++ )
00647       {
00648             // valid slot?
00649             if ( ( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != NULL ) && ControllingRobot( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] ) )
00650             {
00651                   // yep
00652                   return( TRUE );
00653             }
00654       }
00655 
00656       // return number found
00657       return( FALSE );
00658 }
00659 
00660 BOOLEAN SectorSquadIsIn(INT8 bSquadValue, INT16 *sMapX, INT16 *sMapY, INT16 *sMapZ )
00661 {
00662       // returns if there is anyone on the squad and what sector ( strategic ) they are in
00663   INT8 bCounter =0;
00664 
00665       Assert( bSquadValue < ON_DUTY );
00666 
00667       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; bCounter++ )
00668       {
00669             // if valid soldier, get current sector and return
00670             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != NULL )
00671             {
00672                   *sMapX = Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] -> sSectorX;
00673                   *sMapY = Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] -> sSectorY;
00674                   *sMapZ = ( INT16 )Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] -> bSectorZ;
00675 
00676                   return ( TRUE );
00677             }
00678 
00679       }
00680 
00681       // return there is no squad
00682       return ( FALSE );
00683 }

00685 
00686 BOOLEAN CopyPathOfSquadToCharacter(  SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter, INT8 bSquadValue )
00687 {
00688       // copy path from squad to character
00689       INT8 bCounter = 0;
00690       
00691       
00692 
00693       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; bCounter++ )
00694       {
00695             if( ( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != pCharacter ) &&( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != NULL ) )
00696             {
00697                   // valid character, copy paths
00698                    pCharacter -> pMercPath = CopyPaths(  Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] -> pMercPath, pCharacter -> pMercPath);
00699 
00700                    // return success
00701                    return ( TRUE );
00702             }
00703       }
00704 
00705       // return failure
00706       return ( FALSE );
00707 }
00708 
00709 
00710 BOOLEAN CopyPathOfCharacterToSquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter, INT8 bSquadValue )
00711 {
00712       // copy path of this character to members of squad
00713       BOOLEAN fSuccess = FALSE;
00714       INT8 bCounter =0;
00715 
00716   // anyone else on squad?
00717       if( NumberOfPeopleInSquad( bSquadValue ) < 2)
00718       {
00719             // nope
00720 
00721             // return failure
00722             return ( FALSE );
00723       }
00724 
00725       // copy each person on squad, skip this character
00726   for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; bCounter++ )
00727       {
00728             if( ( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != pCharacter ) &&( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != NULL ) )
00729             {
00730                   // valid character, copy paths
00731 
00732                   // first empty path
00733                   Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] -> pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] -> pMercPath, -1 );
00734                   
00735                   // then copy
00736                   Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] -> pMercPath = CopyPaths( pCharacter -> pMercPath, Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] -> pMercPath );
00737 
00738                    // successful at least once
00739                    fSuccess = TRUE;
00740             }
00741       }
00742 
00743       // return success?
00744       return ( fSuccess );
00745 }
00746 
00747 
00748 
00749 INT32 CurrentSquad( void )
00750 {
00751       // returns which squad is current squad
00752 
00753       return( iCurrentTacticalSquad );
00754 }
00755 
00756 BOOLEAN SetCurrentSquad( INT32 iCurrentSquad, BOOLEAN fForce )
00757 {
00758       // set the current tactical squad
00759       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00760 
00761 
00762       // ARM: can't call SetCurrentSquad() in mapscreen, it calls SelectSoldier(), that will initialize interface panels!!!
00763   // ATE: Adjusted conditions a bit ( sometimes were not getting selected )
00764       if ( guiCurrentScreen == LAPTOP_SCREEN || guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
00765   {
00766       return( FALSE );
00767       }
00768 
00769       // ATE; Added to allow us to have NO current squad
00770       if ( iCurrentSquad == NO_CURRENT_SQUAD )
00771       {
00772             // set current squad and return success
00773             iCurrentTacticalSquad = iCurrentSquad;
00774 
00775             // cleat list
00776             RemoveAllPlayersFromSlot( );
00777 
00778             // set all auto faces inactive
00779             SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
00780 
00781             return( FALSE );
00782       }
00783 
00784 
00785       // check if valid value passed
00786       if( ( iCurrentSquad >= NUMBER_OF_SQUADS )||( iCurrentSquad < 0 ) )
00787       {
00788             // no
00789             return ( FALSE );
00790       }
00791 
00792       // check if squad is current
00793       if( iCurrentSquad == iCurrentTacticalSquad && !fForce )
00794       {
00795             return ( TRUE );
00796       }
00797 
00798       // set current squad and return success
00799       iCurrentTacticalSquad = iCurrentSquad;
00800 
00801       // cleat list
00802       RemoveAllPlayersFromSlot( );
00803 
00804       // set all auto faces inactive
00805   SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
00806 
00807       if( iCurrentTacticalSquad != NO_CURRENT_SQUAD )
00808       {
00809             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
00810             {
00811                   if(  Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ] != NULL )
00812                   {
00813                         // squad set, now add soldiers in 
00814                         CheckForAndAddMercToTeamPanel( Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ] );
00815                   }
00816             }
00817       }
00818 
00819       // check if the currently selected guy is on this squad, if not, get the first one on the new squad
00820       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
00821       {
00822             if( Menptr[ gusSelectedSoldier ].bAssignment != iCurrentTacticalSquad )
00823             {
00824                   // ATE: Changed this to FALSE for ackoledgement sounds.. sounds bad if just starting/entering sector..
00825                   SelectSoldier( Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ 0 ]->ubID, FALSE, TRUE );
00826             }
00827       }
00828       else
00829       {
00830             // ATE: Changed this to FALSE for ackoledgement sounds.. sounds bad if just starting/entering sector..
00831             SelectSoldier( Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ 0 ]->ubID, FALSE, TRUE );
00832       }
00833 
00834       return ( TRUE );
00835 }
00836 
00837 void RebuildCurrentSquad( void )
00838 {
00839       // rebuilds current squad to reset faces in tactical
00840       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00841       INT32 iCount = 0;
00842       SOLDIERTYPE *pDeadSoldier = NULL;
00843 
00844       // check if valid value passed
00845       if( ( iCurrentTacticalSquad >= NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ) || ( iCurrentTacticalSquad < 0 ) )
00846       {
00847             // no
00848             return;
00849       }
00850 
00851       // set default squad..just inc ase we no longer have a valid squad
00852       SetDefaultSquadOnSectorEntry( TRUE );
00853 
00854       // cleat list
00855       RemoveAllPlayersFromSlot( );
00856 
00857       // set all auto faces inactive
00858   SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
00859 
00860       gfPausedTacticalRenderInterfaceFlags = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00861 
00862       if( iCurrentTacticalSquad != NO_CURRENT_SQUAD )
00863       {
00864             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
00865             {
00866                   if(  Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ] != NULL )
00867                   {
00868                         // squad set, now add soldiers in 
00869                         CheckForAndAddMercToTeamPanel( Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ] );
00870                   }
00871             }
00872 
00873             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
00874             {
00875                   if(  sDeadMercs[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ] != -1 )
00876                   {
00877                         pDeadSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ( UINT8 )( sDeadMercs[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ] ), TRUE );
00878 
00879                         if( pDeadSoldier )
00880                         {
00881                               // squad set, now add soldiers in 
00882                               CheckForAndAddMercToTeamPanel( pDeadSoldier );
00883                         }
00884                   }
00885             }
00886       }
00887 }

00895

00901             {
00902                   PositionSoldierLight( MercPtrs[ ubLoop ] );                 
00903             }
00904       }
00905       
00906 
00907       // check if valid value passed
00908       //if( ( iCurrentTacticalSquad >= NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ) || ( iCurrentTacticalSquad < 0 ) )
00909       //{
00910             // no
00911       //    return;

00925 BOOLEAN GetSoldiersInSquad( INT32 iCurrentSquad, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldierArray[] )
00926 {
00927       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00928       // will get the soldiertype pts for every merc in this squad
00929 
00930       // check if valid value passed
00931       if( ( iCurrentSquad >= NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ) || ( iCurrentSquad < 0 ) )
00932       {
00933             // no
00934             return ( FALSE );
00935       }
00936 
00937       // copy pts values over
00938       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
00939       {
00940             pSoldierArray[ iCounter ] = Squad[ iCurrentSquad ][ iCounter ];
00941       }
00942 
00943       return ( TRUE );
00944 }

00946 
00947 BOOLEAN IsSquadOnCurrentTacticalMap( INT32 iCurrentSquad )
00948 {
00949       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00950       // check to see if this squad is on the current map
00951 
00952       // check if valid value passed
00953       if( ( iCurrentSquad >= NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ) || ( iCurrentSquad < 0 ) )
00954       {
00955             // no
00956             return ( FALSE );
00957       }
00958 
00959       // go through memebrs of squad...if anyone on this map, return true
00960       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
00961       {
00962             if(  Squad[ iCurrentSquad ][ iCounter ] != NULL )
00963             {
00964                   // ATE; Added more checks here for being in sector ( fBetweenSectors and SectorZ )
00965                   if( ( Squad[ iCurrentSquad ][ iCounter ]->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX ) && ( Squad[ iCurrentSquad ][ iCounter ]->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY ) && Squad[ iCurrentSquad ][ iCounter ]->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ && Squad[ iCurrentSquad ][ iCounter ]->fBetweenSectors != TRUE )
00966                   {
00967                         return( TRUE );
00968                   }
00969             }
00970       }
00971 
00972       return( FALSE );
00973 }
00974 
00975 
00976 void SetDefaultSquadOnSectorEntry( BOOLEAN fForce )
00977 {
00978       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00979       // check if selected squad is in current sector, if so, do nothing, if not...first first case that they are
00980 
00981       if( IsSquadOnCurrentTacticalMap( iCurrentTacticalSquad ) == TRUE )
00982       {
00983             // is in sector, leave
00984             return;
00985       }
00986 
00987       //otherwise...
00988 
00989       // find first squad availiable
00990       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
00991       {
00992             if( IsSquadOnCurrentTacticalMap( iCounter ) == TRUE )
00993             {
00994                   // squad in sector...set as current
00995                   SetCurrentSquad( iCounter, fForce );
00996 
00997                   return;
00998             }
00999       }
01000 
01001       // If here, set to no current squad
01002       SetCurrentSquad( NO_CURRENT_SQUAD, FALSE );
01003       
01004       return;
01005 }
01006 
01007 INT32 GetLastSquadActive( void )
01008 {
01009       // find id of last squad in the list with active mercs in it
01010       INT32 iCounter =0, iCounterB = 0;
01011       INT32 iLastSquad = 0;
01012 
01013       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
01014       {
01015             for( iCounterB = 0; iCounterB < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounterB++ )
01016             {
01017                   if( Squad[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ] != NULL )
01018                   {
01019                         iLastSquad = iCounter;
01020                   }
01021             }
01022       }
01023 
01024       return ( iLastSquad );
01025 }

01028 void GetSquadPosition( UINT8 *ubNextX, UINT8 *ubNextY, UINT8 *ubPrevX, UINT8 *ubPrevY, UINT32 *uiTraverseTime, UINT32 *uiArriveTime, UINT8 ubSquadValue )
01029 {
01030       // grab the mvt group for this squad and find all this information
01031 
01032       if( SquadMovementGroups[ ubSquadValue ] == 0 )
01033       {
01034             *ubNextX = 0;
01035             *ubNextY = 0; 
01036             *ubPrevX = 0; 
01037             *ubPrevY = 0;
01038             *uiTraverseTime = 0;
01039             *uiArriveTime = 0;
01040             return;
01041       }
01042 
01043       // grab this squads mvt position
01044       GetGroupPosition( ubNextX, ubNextY, ubPrevX, ubPrevY, uiTraverseTime, uiArriveTime, SquadMovementGroups[ ubSquadValue ] );
01045       
01046       return;
01047 }
01048 
01049 
01050 void SetSquadPositionBetweenSectors( UINT8 ubNextX, UINT8 ubNextY, UINT8 ubPrevX, UINT8 ubPrevY, UINT32 uiTraverseTime, UINT32 uiArriveTime, UINT8 ubSquadValue  )
01051 {
01052       // set mvt group position for squad for 
01053 
01054       if( SquadMovementGroups[ ubSquadValue ] == 0 )
01055       {
01056             return;
01057       }
01058       SetGroupPosition(  ubNextX,  ubNextY,  ubPrevX,  ubPrevY,  uiTraverseTime,  uiArriveTime,   SquadMovementGroups[ ubSquadValue ] );
01059 
01060       return;
01061 }

01064 
01065 BOOLEAN SaveSquadInfoToSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
01066 {
01067       SAVE_SQUAD_INFO_STRUCT sSquadSaveStruct[ NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ][ NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ];
01068       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten = 0;
01069       UINT32      uiSaveSize=0;
01070       //Reset the current squad info
01071       INT32 iCounterB = 0;
01072       INT32 iCounter =0;
01073 
01074 
01075       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter <  NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
01076       {
01077             for( iCounterB =0; iCounterB < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounterB++ )
01078             {
01079                   if( Squad[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ] )
01080                         sSquadSaveStruct[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ].uiID  = Squad[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ]->ubID;
01081                   else
01082                         sSquadSaveStruct[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ].uiID = -1;
01083             }
01084       }
01085 
01086       //Save the squad info to the Saved Game File
01087       uiSaveSize = sizeof( SAVE_SQUAD_INFO_STRUCT ) * NUMBER_OF_SQUADS * NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD;
01088 
01089       FileWrite( hFile, sSquadSaveStruct, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
01090       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
01091       {
01092             return(FALSE);
01093       }
01094 
01095 
01096       //Save all the squad movement id's
01097       FileWrite( hFile, SquadMovementGroups, sizeof( INT8 ) * NUMBER_OF_SQUADS, &uiNumBytesWritten );
01098       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( INT8 ) * NUMBER_OF_SQUADS )
01099       {
01100             return(FALSE);
01101       }
01102 
01103 
01104 
01105       return( TRUE );
01106 }
01107 
01108 
01109 
01110 BOOLEAN LoadSquadInfoFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
01111 {
01112       SAVE_SQUAD_INFO_STRUCT sSquadSaveStruct[ NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ][ NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ];
01113       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
01114       UINT32      uiSaveSize=0;
01115 
01116       //Reset the current squad info
01117       INT32 iCounterB = 0;
01118       INT32 iCounter =0;
01119 
01120       // null each list of ptrs.
01121       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter <  NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
01122       {
01123             for( iCounterB =0; iCounterB < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounterB++ )
01124             {
01125               // squad, soldier 
01126               Squad[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ]= NULL;
01127             }
01128       }
01129 
01130 
01131       // Load in the squad info
01132       uiSaveSize = sizeof( SAVE_SQUAD_INFO_STRUCT ) * NUMBER_OF_SQUADS * NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD;
01133 
01134       FileRead( hFile, sSquadSaveStruct, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
01135       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiSaveSize )
01136       {
01137             return(FALSE);
01138       }
01139 
01140 
01141 
01142       // Loop through the array loaded in
01143       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter <  NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounter++ )
01144       {
01145             for( iCounterB =0; iCounterB < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounterB++ )
01146             {
01147                   if( sSquadSaveStruct[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ].uiID != -1 )
01148                         Squad[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ]      = &Menptr[ sSquadSaveStruct[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ].uiID ];
01149                   else
01150                         Squad[ iCounter ][ iCounterB ] = NULL;
01151             }
01152       }
01153 
01154 
01155       //Load in the Squad movement id's
01156       FileRead( hFile, SquadMovementGroups, sizeof( INT8 ) * NUMBER_OF_SQUADS, &uiNumBytesRead );
01157       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( INT8 ) * NUMBER_OF_SQUADS )
01158       {
01159             return(FALSE);
01160       }
01161 
01162       return( TRUE );
01163 }
01164 
01165 
01166 void GetLocationOfSquad( INT16 *sX, INT16 *sY, INT8 *bZ, INT8 bSquadValue )
01167 {
01168       // run through list of guys, once valid merc found, get his sector x and y and z
01169       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01170 
01171       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
01172       {
01173             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] )
01174             {
01175                   // valid guy
01176                   *sX = Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ]->sSectorX;
01177                   *sY = Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ]->sSectorY;
01178                   *bZ = Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ]->bSectorZ;
01179             }
01180       }
01181 
01182       return;
01183 }
01184 
01185 BOOLEAN IsThisSquadOnTheMove( INT8 bSquadValue )
01186 {
01187       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01188 
01189       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
01190       {
01191             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] )
01192             {
01193                   return( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ]->fBetweenSectors );
01194             }
01195       }
01196 
01197       return( FALSE );
01198 }
01199 
01200 // rebuild this squad after someone has been removed, to 'squeeze' together any empty spots
01201 void RebuildSquad( INT8 bSquadValue )
01202 {
01203       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCounterB = 0;
01204 
01205       for( iCounterB = 0; iCounterB <NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD - 1; iCounterB++ )
01206       {
01207             for( iCounter = 0 ;iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD - 1; iCounter++ )
01208             {
01209                   if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] == NULL )
01210                   {
01211                         if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter + 1 ] != NULL )
01212                         {
01213                               Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] = Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter + 1 ];
01214                               Squad[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter + 1 ] = NULL;
01215                         }
01216                   }
01217             }
01218       }
01219 
01220       return;
01221 }
01222 
01223 void UpdateCurrentlySelectedMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bSquadValue )
01224 {
01225       UINT8 ubID;
01226 
01227       // if this squad is the current one and and the psoldier is the currently selected soldier, get rid of 'em
01228       if( bSquadValue != iCurrentTacticalSquad )
01229       {
01230             return;
01231       }
01232 
01233       // Are we the selected guy?
01234       if( gusSelectedSoldier == pSoldier->ubID )
01235       {
01236             ubID = FindNextActiveAndAliveMerc( pSoldier, FALSE, FALSE ); 
01237       
01238             if ( ubID != NOBODY && ubID != gusSelectedSoldier )
01239             {
01240                   SelectSoldier( ubID, FALSE, FALSE );
01241             }
01242             else
01243             {
01244                   gusSelectedSoldier = NOBODY;
01245 
01246       // ATE: Make sure we are in TEAM panel at this point!
01247                   SetCurrentInterfacePanel( TEAM_PANEL );
01248             }
01249       }
01250 
01251       return;
01252 }
01253 
01254 
01255 BOOLEAN IsSquadInSector( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubSquad )
01256 {
01257 
01258       if( pSoldier == NULL )
01259       {
01260             return( FALSE );
01261       }
01262 
01263       if( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors == TRUE )
01264       {
01265             return( FALSE );
01266       }
01267 
01268       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
01269       {
01270             return( FALSE );
01271       }
01272 
01273       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
01274       {
01275             return( FALSE );
01276       }
01277 
01278       if( SquadIsEmpty( ubSquad ) == TRUE )
01279       {
01280             return( TRUE );
01281       }
01282 
01283       if( ( pSoldier->sSectorX != Squad[ ubSquad ][ 0 ]->sSectorX ) ||( pSoldier->sSectorY != Squad[ ubSquad ][ 0 ]->sSectorY ) || ( pSoldier->bSectorZ != Squad[ ubSquad ][ 0 ]->bSectorZ ) )
01284       {
01285             return( FALSE );
01286       }
01287 
01288       if( Squad[ ubSquad ][ 0 ]->fBetweenSectors == TRUE )
01289       {
01290             return( FALSE );
01291       }
01292 
01293 
01294       return( TRUE );
01295 }
01296 
01297 
01298 BOOLEAN IsAnyMercOnSquadAsleep( UINT8 ubSquadValue )
01299 {
01300       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01301 
01302       if( SquadIsEmpty( ubSquadValue ) == TRUE )
01303       {
01304             return( FALSE );
01305       }
01306 
01307       for( iCounter = 0 ;iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD - 1; iCounter++ )
01308       {
01309             if( Squad[ ubSquadValue ][ iCounter ] != NULL )
01310             {
01311                   if( Squad[ ubSquadValue ][ iCounter ]-> fMercAsleep )
01312                   {
01313                         return( TRUE );
01314                   }
01315             }
01316       }
01317 
01318       return( FALSE );
01319 }
01320 
01321 BOOLEAN AddDeadCharacterToSquadDeadGuys( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iSquadValue )
01322 {
01323       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01324       SOLDIERTYPE *pTempSoldier = NULL;
01325 
01326 
01327 
01328       // is dead guy in any squad
01329       if( IsDeadGuyOnAnySquad( pSoldier ) == TRUE )
01330       {
01331             return( TRUE );
01332       }
01333 
01334       // first find out if the guy is in the list
01335       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
01336       {
01337             // valid soldier?
01338             if( sDeadMercs[ iSquadValue ][ iCounter ] != -1 )
01339             {
01340                   pTempSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ( UINT8 )( sDeadMercs[ iSquadValue ][ iCounter ] ), TRUE );
01341 
01342                   if( pSoldier == pTempSoldier )
01343                   {
01344                         return( TRUE );
01345                   }
01346             }
01347       }
01348 
01349 
01350       // now insert the guy
01351       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
01352       {
01353             // valid soldier?
01354             if( sDeadMercs[ iSquadValue ][ iCounter ] != -1 )
01355             {
01356                   // yep
01357                   pTempSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ( UINT8 )( sDeadMercs[ iSquadValue ][ iCounter ] ), TRUE );
01358 
01359                   // valid soldier?
01360                   if( pTempSoldier == NULL )
01361                   {
01362                         // nope
01363                         sDeadMercs[ iSquadValue ][ iCounter ] = pSoldier->ubProfile;
01364                         return( TRUE );
01365                   }
01366             }
01367             else
01368             {
01369                   // nope
01370                   sDeadMercs[ iSquadValue ][ iCounter ] = pSoldier->ubProfile;
01371                   return( TRUE );   
01372             }
01373       }
01374 
01375       // no go
01376       return( FALSE );
01377 }
01378 
01379 BOOLEAN IsDeadGuyOnAnySquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01380 {
01381       INT32 iCounterA = 0, iCounter = 0;
01382 
01383       // squad?
01384       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iCounterA++ )
01385       {
01386             // slot?
01387             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
01388             {
01389                   if( sDeadMercs[ iCounterA ][ iCounter ] == pSoldier->ubProfile )
01390                   {
01391                         return( TRUE );
01392                   }
01393             }
01394       }
01395 
01396       return ( FALSE );
01397 }
01398 
01399 BOOLEAN IsDeadGuyInThisSquadSlot( INT8 bSlotId, INT8 bSquadValue , INT8 *bNumberOfDeadGuysSoFar )
01400 {
01401       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCount = 0;
01402 
01403       // see if we have gone too far?
01404       if( bSlotId < *bNumberOfDeadGuysSoFar )
01405       {
01406             // reset
01407             *bNumberOfDeadGuysSoFar = 0;
01408       }
01409 
01410       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
01411       {
01412             if( sDeadMercs[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] != -1 )
01413             {
01414                   // not gone far enough yet
01415                   if( *bNumberOfDeadGuysSoFar > iCounter )
01416                   {
01417                         iCount++;
01418                   }
01419                   else
01420                   {
01421                         // far enough, start checking
01422                         bNumberOfDeadGuysSoFar++;
01423 
01424                         return( TRUE );
01425                   }
01426             }
01427       }
01428 
01429       return( FALSE );
01430 }
01431 
01432 
01433 BOOLEAN SoldierIsDeadAndWasOnSquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bSquadValue )
01434 {
01435       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01436 
01437       if( bSquadValue == NO_CURRENT_SQUAD )
01438       {
01439             return( FALSE );
01440       }
01441 
01442       // check if guy is on squad
01443       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
01444       {
01445             if( pSoldier->ubProfile == sDeadMercs[ bSquadValue ][ iCounter ] )
01446             {
01447                   return( TRUE );
01448             }
01449       }
01450 
01451       return( FALSE );
01452 }

01454 BOOLEAN ResetDeadSquadMemberList( INT32 iSquadValue )
01455 {
01456       memset( sDeadMercs[ iSquadValue ], -1, sizeof( INT16 ) * NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD );
01457 
01458       return( TRUE );
01459 }

01462 // this passed  soldier on the current squad int he tactical map
01463 BOOLEAN IsMercOnCurrentSquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01464 {
01465       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01466       
01467       // valid soldier?
01468       if( pSoldier == NULL )
01469       {
01470             // no
01471             return( FALSE );
01472       }
01473 
01474       // active grunt?
01475       if( pSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
01476       {
01477             // no
01478             return( FALSE );
01479       }
01480 
01481       // current squad valid?
01482   if( iCurrentTacticalSquad >= NUMBER_OF_SQUADS )
01483       {
01484             // no
01485             return( FALSE );
01486       }
01487 
01488 
01489       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
01490       {
01491             if( Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ] == pSoldier )
01492             {
01493                   // found him
01494                   return( TRUE );
01495             }
01496       }
01497 
01498       return( FALSE );
01499 }
01500 
01501 INT8 NumberOfPlayerControllableMercsInSquad( INT8 bSquadValue )
01502 {
01503       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01504       INT8 bCounter = 0;
01505       INT8 bSquadCount = 0;
01506 
01507       if( bSquadValue == NO_CURRENT_SQUAD )
01508       {
01509             return( 0 );
01510       }
01511 
01512       // find number of characters in particular squad.
01513       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; bCounter++ )
01514       {
01515 
01516             // valid slot?
01517             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != NULL )
01518             {
01519                   // yep
01520                   pSoldier = Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] ;
01521 
01522                   //Kris:  This breaks the CLIENT of this function, tactical traversal.  Do NOT check for EPCS or ROBOT here.
01523                   //if ( !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && 
01524                   if( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
01525                   {
01526                         bSquadCount++;
01527                   }
01528             }
01529       }
01530 
01531       // return number found
01532       return( bSquadCount );
01533 }

01536 BOOLEAN DoesVehicleExistInSquad( INT8 bSquadValue )
01537 {
01538       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01539       INT8 bCounter = 0;
01540       INT8 bSquadCount = 0;
01541 
01542       if( bSquadValue == NO_CURRENT_SQUAD )
01543       {
01544             return( FALSE );
01545       }
01546 
01547       // find number of characters in particular squad.
01548       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD ; bCounter++ )
01549       {
01550             // valid slot?
01551             if( Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] != NULL )
01552             {
01553                   // yep
01554                   pSoldier = Squad[ bSquadValue ][ bCounter ] ;
01555 
01556                   // If we are an EPC or ROBOT, don't allow this
01557                   if ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
01558                   {
01559                         return( TRUE );
01560                   }
01561             }
01562       }
01563 
01564       return(FALSE );
01565 }
01566 
01567 void CheckSquadMovementGroups( void )
01568 {
01569       INT32             iSquad;
01570       GROUP *           pGroup;
01571 
01572       for( iSquad = 0; iSquad < NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; iSquad++ )
01573       {
01574             pGroup = GetGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ iSquad ] );
01575             if ( pGroup == NULL )
01576             {
01577                   // recreate group
01578                   SquadMovementGroups[ iSquad ] = CreateNewPlayerGroupDepartingFromSector( 1, 1 );
01579 
01580                   // Set persistent....
01581                   pGroup = GetGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ iSquad ] );
01582                   Assert( pGroup );
01583                   pGroup->fPersistant = TRUE;
01584             }
01585       }
01586 }
